tabs.delivery_content:
<h2>Purchasing & Delivery</h2>
Before You Buy

To avoid delivery day disappointments, measure the area you plan to place your new furniture in, as well as the furniture you have selected to purchase, before placing your order. Also measure any doorways (height and width) through which the furniture must pass to get to its final position in your home. Identify any delivery obstacles – is there enough ceiling clearance? Will the furniture clear the stairway or elevator? Can the piece be maneuvered around any right angles? Because of our commitment to providing you with outstanding customer service.

Delivery

Always free shipping

onboarding.title: This page will show all of your store's products
onboarding.subtext: There are no products yet, but once you begin adding them they will show up here regardless if they are in a collection.

onboarding.products_text_html: It takes less than a minute to add your first product to your store. Make sure you add it to the {{ frontpage }} collection to see it on the home page.

onboarding.page_text: You can change this area's text by editing the "Frontpage" page in your admin's Pages section. You can also replace the "Frontpage" page with another page in your Theme Settings.
